thread.title: Is Britian ready with just one year until Brexit?

title: Is Britian ready with just one year until Brexit?
text:
Is Britian ready with just one year until Brexit? 9:31pm IST - 01:38 
With just a year to go until Britain leaves the EU new data shows key retail sales fell in March for the first time in five months. It's the latest disappointment for investors who are increasingly concerned about an ongoing divide in Britain over Brexit. Kate King reports.
